name: cliffy
description: WASM-first reactive framework with classical FRP semantics and geometric algebra foundation

scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run postbuild:wasm
scripts.build:release: wasm-pack build cliffy-wasm --target web --release --out-dir pkg && npm run postbuild:wasm
scripts.dev: cargo watch -w cliffy-core -w cliffy-wasm -s 'wasm-pack build cliffy-wasm --target web --out-dir pkg --dev && node scripts/post-wasm-build.js'
scripts.clean: cargo clean && rm -rf cliffy-wasm/pkg examples/*/dist examples/*/node_modules/.vite

author: Cliffy Team
